version_description:
▶ Holiday FUN FUN FUN
▶ NEW seasonal animatronics
▶ Wintery cheer for your map!
▶ Holiday event and goodies
▶ More bug fixes & optimizations

▶ More opportunities to earn Faz-Coins!
▶ Discover a larger variety of event present rewards!
▶ Updates to our Special Delivery system allowing more featured animatronics to come visit!
▶ As always--more bug fixes & optimizations coming your way!

▶ Another special delivery is on its way~
▶ Daily challenges are here for more FUN FUN FUN every day--
▶ Your animatronics are waiting for you to come play!

▶ Improved animatronic salvaging
▶ New updates to notifications
▶ More bug fixes & optimizations

▶ Exciting monthly skins!
▶ Continued work on game optimizations and fixes

▶ Support for new animatronics
▶ More bug fixes & optimizations

▶ Animatronics roam the map searching out a home for their Special Deliveries! If you’re brave enough to interact you may find all sorts of goodies.
9.0 is the first of our Fall releases, and we're hard at work setting-up systems for even MORE exciting gameplay updates that will be coming your way!

▶ Version 10 includes a new animatronic character with a whole new schtick for you to puzzle over and master.
▶ Further optimizations and bug fixes while we prepare to roll out more features!

▶ It's the start of our Winter Season, with updates to Events, so you know what rewards are headed your way.
▶ New challenges, with more interesting rewards for the Daily Challenges, including the ability to fast-forward Event rewards.
▶ As always, more bug fixes and improvements.

▶ Fazbear's Photo Booth - In this first version, snap photos of your favorite animatronics to share with your friends and family!
▶ Bug fixes and optimizations

▶ Fazbear's Photo Booth - New and improved, snap photos of your favorite animatronics and add frames to share with your friends and family!
▶ Bug fixes and optimizations

▶ Fazbear's Photo Booth - New and improved, snap photos of your favorite animatronics and add frames to share with your friends and family!
▶ Bug fixes and optimizations

Our big update is here! We’ve been hard at work on the following:

▶ Introduction of a level-up system to unlock animatronics
▶ New animatronic encounter mechanics with more strategic gameplay
▶ Introduction of player buffs to plus up your encounters
▶ New Leaderboards, and more competitive gameplay
